sentences.en: Evidently, living things can somehow distinguish between optical isomers.
sentences.cn: 显然, 生物体对这两种同分异构体能够有所识别.

sentences.en: Its accuracy and optical resolution may be influenced by atmospheric absorption bands.
sentences.cn: 它的精密度和光学分辨力将受大气中吸收频带的影响.
显微镜和其他光学仪器

sentences.en: Nearly every long-distance call made in Britain now travels on optical fibre instead of cable.
sentences.cn: 现在在英国，几乎所有长途电话都通过光纤而非电缆传输。

sentences.en: Optical fibers have replaced small electric lights in some medical instruments.
sentences.cn: 光学纤维已经代替了某些医疗器械中的小电灯.

sentences.en: optical instruments such as microscopes and telescopes
sentences.cn: 显微镜和望远镜等光学仪器

sentences.en: Since optical paths are reversible, the opposite arrangement is also true.
sentences.cn: 因为光路是可逆的, 所以也可以反过来安装.

sentences.en: Sloping walls on the bulk of the building create an optical illusion.
sentences.cn: 大楼主体的斜墙给人造成一种视错觉。

sentences.en: Telescopes and microscopes are optical instruments.
sentences.cn: 望远镜和显微镜是光学仪器.

sentences.en: The camera combines rugged reliability with unequalled optical performance and speed.
sentences.cn: 这款相机既坚固耐用，又有超凡的光学性能和快门速度。

sentences.en: These are modern materials having greater uniformity and higher optical sensitivity.
sentences.cn: 这些是均质性更好、光学灵敏度更高的现代材料.

sentences.en: These optical fibres may be used for new sorts of telephony.
sentences.cn: 这些光缆可以用于新型电话通讯系统。

sentences.en: They concentrated on better definition of the optical image.
sentences.cn: 他们致力于提高该光学影像的清晰度.

sentences.en: This orbiting telescope is the largest optical instrument in space.
sentences.cn: 这种轨道望远镜是宇宙中最大的光学仪器.

sentences.en: With pleasure. Now we can offer Optical Mark Readers of models.
sentences.cn: 很愿意. 目前我们能提供光学记录阅读器的模型.

phrases.tran_cn: 光学显微镜；光学显微术；光学显微学

trans.tran_cn: 视觉的，视力的，眼睛的，光学的
trans.tran_en: relating to machines or processes which are concerned with light, images, or the way we see things
